languages.text: "Каких еще "нас"? Поосторожнее с этим словом, оно меня нервирует. Есть я, моя банда и мои новички. Что же касается Комиссара, то именно в таком бесполезном виде он меня устраивает больше всего. Это огромный прогресс по сравнению с тем, каким он был раньше — необычайно вредоносным".

"What do you mean 'us'? Watch how you use that word — it makes me antsy. There is me, my gang, and my recruits. As for the Commissar, it suits me best to have him in this useless state. It's a huge improvement on how he was before — unusually damaging."
languages.original_text: "Каких еще "нас"? Поосторожнее с этим словом, оно меня нервирует. Есть я, моя банда и мои новички. Что же касается Комиссара, то именно в таком бесполезном виде он меня устраивает больше всего. Это огромный прогресс по сравнению с тем, каким он был раньше — необычайно вредоносным".

traits.locale_text: "What do you mean 'us'? Watch how you use that word — it makes me antsy. There is me, my gang, and my recruits. As for the Commissar, it suits me best to have him in this useless state. It's a huge improvement on how he was before — unusually damaging."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "What do you mean 'us'? Watch how you use that word — it makes me antsy. There is me, my gang, and my recruits. As for the Commissar, it suits me best to have him in this useless state. It's a huge improvement on how he was before — unusually damaging."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "What do you mean 'us'? Watch how you use that word — it makes me antsy. There is me, my gang, and my recruits. As for the Commissar, it suits me best to have him in this useless state. It's a huge improvement on how he was before — unusually damaging."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "What do you mean 'us'? Watch how you use that word — it makes me antsy. There is me, my gang, and my recruits. As for the Commissar, it suits me best to have him in this useless state. It's a huge improvement on how he was before — unusually damaging."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: “你说‘我们’是什么意思？说话的时候当心点，这个词让我很不爽。这里是我的地盘，这些人是我的手下，都是我的。至于政委，就让他这么没用下去吧，我很喜欢。和他之前过于暴躁的样子相比，他现在这样真的是进步了不少。”
languages.original_text: "What do you mean 'us'? Watch how you use that word — it makes me antsy. There is me, my gang, and my recruits. As for the Commissar, it suits me best to have him in this useless state. It's a huge improvement on how he was before — unusually damaging."

traits.locale_text: “你说‘我们’是什么意思？说话的时候当心点，这个词让我很不爽。这里是我的地盘，这些人是我的手下，都是我的。至于政委，就让他这么没用下去吧，我很喜欢。和他之前过于暴躁的样子相比，他现在这样真的是进步了不少。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «¿Cómo que "nos"? Cuidado con cómo usas esa palabra, me pone nervioso. Estamos mi banda, mis reclutas y yo. En cuanto al Comisario, prefiero dejarlo en estado de inutilidad. Es mucho mejor que lo que era antes: un problema enorme».
languages.original_text: "What do you mean 'us'? Watch how you use that word — it makes me antsy. There is me, my gang, and my recruits. As for the Commissar, it suits me best to have him in this useless state. It's a huge improvement on how he was before — unusually damaging."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo que "nos"? Cuidado con cómo usas esa palabra, me pone nervioso. Estamos mi banda, mis reclutas y yo. En cuanto al Comisario, prefiero dejarlo en estado de inutilidad. Es mucho mejor que lo que era antes: un problema enorme».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「“我々”とはどういうことだ？なれなれしくするな、虫唾が走る。私と、私の一味と、私の新兵だけが唯一の仲間だ。コミッサーはこの状態にしておくのがいいだろう。異常に損層が多かった以前の姿と比べれば遥かにましだ」
languages.original_text: "What do you mean 'us'? Watch how you use that word — it makes me antsy. There is me, my gang, and my recruits. As for the Commissar, it suits me best to have him in this useless state. It's a huge improvement on how he was before — unusually damaging."

traits.locale_text: 「“我々”とはどういうことだ？なれなれしくするな、虫唾が走る。私と、私の一味と、私の新兵だけが唯一の仲間だ。コミッサーはこの状態にしておくのがいいだろう。異常に損層が多かった以前の姿と比べれば遥かにましだ」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Was meint Ihr mit 'wir'? Passt auf, wie Ihr dieses Wort verwendet. Es macht mich nervös. Es gibt mich, meine Bande und meine Rekruten. Was den Kommissar angeht, es ist für mich das Beste, ihn in diesem nutzlosen Zustand zu belassen. Das ist eine gewaltige Verbesserung, früher war er viel ... schädlicher."
languages.original_text: "What do you mean 'us'? Watch how you use that word — it makes me antsy. There is me, my gang, and my recruits. As for the Commissar, it suits me best to have him in this useless state. It's a huge improvement on how he was before — unusually damaging."

traits.locale_text: "Was meint Ihr mit 'wir'? Passt auf, wie Ihr dieses Wort verwendet. Es macht mich nervös. Es gibt mich, meine Bande und meine Rekruten. Was den Kommissar angeht, es ist für mich das Beste, ihn in diesem nutzlosen Zustand zu belassen. Das ist eine gewaltige Verbesserung, früher war er viel ... schädlicher."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Comment ça, "nous" ? Évitez d'employer ce mot à tout-va ; il me rend nerveux. Il y a moi, ma bande et mes recrues. Quant au commissaire, je préfère l'avoir impuissant à mes côtés plutôt que sous sa forme précédente ; il était étonnamment nuisible. »
languages.original_text: "What do you mean 'us'? Watch how you use that word — it makes me antsy. There is me, my gang, and my recruits. As for the Commissar, it suits me best to have him in this useless state. It's a huge improvement on how he was before — unusually damaging."

traits.locale_text: « Comment ça, "nous" ? Évitez d'employer ce mot à tout-va ; il me rend nerveux. Il y a moi, ma bande et mes recrues. Quant au commissaire, je préfère l'avoir impuissant à mes côtés plutôt que sous sa forme précédente ; il était étonnamment nuisible. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "'Bulabiliriz' mi? Ağzından çıkanı kulağın duysun, germe beni. Ben, çetem ve adamlarımdan başkasını tanımam. Komiser'e gelince... Bu işlevsiz hâli benim işime geliyor. Bence önceki vaziyetinden çok daha iyi. Eskiden hayli can sıkıcıydı."
languages.original_text: "What do you mean 'us'? Watch how you use that word — it makes me antsy. There is me, my gang, and my recruits. As for the Commissar, it suits me best to have him in this useless state. It's a huge improvement on how he was before — unusually damaging."

traits.locale_text: ""Biz"li mi konuşuyorsun sen? Ağzından çıkanı kulağın duysun, geriyorsun beni. Ben, çetem ve adamlarımdan başkasını tanımam. Komiser'e gelince... Bu işlevsiz hâli benim işime geliyor. Böyle önceki vaziyetinden çok daha iyi. Hayli can sıkıcıydı da."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
